actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5 of the act entitled "An act to incorporate the American Legion" to change the requirements for membership in the American Legion.

summary.text: Changes the requirements for membership in the American Legion so as to require at least two years of service in the naval or military services of the United States. (Amends 36 U.S.C. 45)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5 of the act entitled "An act to incorporate the American Legion" to change the requirements for membership in the American Legion.
